doc:
Albert Préjean https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Pr%C3%A9jean 0 Albert Préjean (27 October 1894 in Paris – 1 November 1979 in Paris) was a French actor, primarily in film. He served in World War I, and was decorated with the Croix de Guerre and the Legion d'honneur. With Lysiane Rey, he was the father of Patrick Préjean, and grandfather of Laura Préjean. Albert_Préjean ( 27_October_1894 in Paris – 1_November_1979 in Paris ) was a_French_actor , primarily in film . He served in World_War_I , and was_decorated with the_Croix de Guerre and the_Legion_d'honneur . With Lysiane_Rey , he was the_father of Patrick_Préjean , and grandfather of Laura_Préjean .
